title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street, following a blue car.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and visibility is reduced. Other cars are driving ahead, and a blue car is driving in front of the ego vehicle. There is a red traffic light on the side of the road, and a large billboard is visible in the background. The weather is rainy, and the rain is falling heavily.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. It follows the blue car ahead, keeping a safe distance. The red traffic light indicates that the ego vehicle should continue driving straight. The large billboard in the background is not a safety concern, but it adds to the overall atmosphere of the rainy city.
